title: @Riot KateyKhaos Small change for Project Ashe if I could recommend one.
body: Shouldn't she have a bar code on her forehead? Or is it that just a one off thing? I think it'd be kinda cool.

replies.body: Thanks for the feedback! It's not something we had planned for her, but something I can relay to the team. If I had to guess, I would say it's something we felt didn't need to be included on everyone. :)
Oh, okay. Thanks for the reply.
